Letter from Queen Navari:
Those Fragments found at near Cruma Tower is not related to what we are truly seeking.
Even thought, we can still get more clues from The Giants inside the tower.
Now, go find High Priest Sylvian of Einhasad's Temple at Town of Dion to ask more from his aid.
(I left a Scroll of Escapealong with the letter in this envelope. If you want to have a quick travel, then just use it.)
